txt.en:
'Well met, [placeholder], I hope the folk of Breeland have not treated you too poorly during your time here? Alas, it is true that since rumours of dark tidings have come out of the East, so too have a great many men of shall we say... Questionable repute? No doubt you've come across a few of them already.

But from what I hear you have taken up the cause of some number of the people of Breeland of late, and for that I commend you. Dark times such as these call for folk of action and bravery to stand forth!

I will be keeping an eye on you [placeholder], for I suspect that there is a tale to your deeds that shall soon be told.'
Danger presses upon Bree-land from all sides, foreshadowing the ascension of a great darkness. You are called to stand against the Shadow. Your efforts on behalf of Bree-land will be rewarded.
Seek out Whelan Appledore and tell him of your accomplishments.
Your efforts on behalf of Bree-land will be rewarded.
